subject: even on easter I can't stop the research
author: bhali333
full_text:
here are only two from joe's box

The first one says "you have a toothache" and I did!

The other I am asking about mike and he tells me 
"foget about me you are the teacher"

Maybe I they feel I have outgrown my tech's and hopefully have the 
right theories and opinions I am passing on to the new researchers.

hope everyone had a good holiday :)

Bruce
